mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_id, userid, product_code, amount) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{product_code}, #{amount} )
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select cart_id,p.product_code,c.userid,name,product_name,amount,price,price*amount money from member m, cart c, product p where m.userid=c.userid and c.product_code=p.product_code and c.userid=#{userid} order by cart_id
select product_name, sum(price*amount) money from cart c, product p where c.product_code=p.product_code group by product_name order by product_name
